English: lit. If the old doesn't go, the new will not come.

h.b: ㄐㄧㄡˋ　˙ㄉㄜ　ㄅㄨˋ　ㄑㄩˋ　ㄒㄧㄣ　˙ㄉㄜ　ㄅㄨˋ　ㄌㄞˊ

d.f: （`諺語~）`棄~`失~`舊~`有的~`事物~，`才~`有機~`會得~`到~`嶄新~`的~`東西~。

h.p: jiù de bù qù xīn de bù lái

English: lit. If the old doesn't go, the new will not come.
You can't make progress by clinging to old notions.
